name: 楊濠瞬
objective:
線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一,著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明.課程大綱如下：
1.解聯立方程式
2.矩陣運算
3.行列式
4.向量空間
5.線性轉換
6.特徵值及特徵向量
7.選擇性題材,視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法, Jordan form ,或線性規劃
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Linear equations in linear algebra
Week 3: Systems of linear equations
Week 4: Vector equations
Week 5: Matrix algebra
Week 6: Determinants
Week 7: Volume and linear transformations
Week 8: Vector spaces
Week 9: Midterm exam
Week 10: Null and column spaces
Week 11: Linear transformations and independent sets
Week 12: Coordinate systems
Week 13: Eigenvalues
Week 14: Eigenvectors
Week 15: Orthogonality and least squares
Week 16: Symmetric matrices and quadratic forms
Week 17: Geometry of vector spaces
Week 18: Final exam
materials: Linear Algebra and its Applications (Fifth Edition) by David C. Lay, Stephen R. Lay, Judi J. McDonald
